[ library(eplex) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

lp_add_vars(+Handle, +Vars)

Declare Vars to be problem variables for the solver state Handle
Handle
Handle to a solver state
Vars
A list of variables or numbers

Description

Declares variables in Vars as problem variables for the solver state represented by Handle. Any of the variables that are not existing problem variables for Handle are added to the problem. The new variables' bounds are constrained to -infinity..infinity (infinity as defined by the external solver).

Fail Conditions

Vars contain elements which are neither variables or numbers.

See Also

lp_setup / 4, lp_demon_setup / 5
